description: In accordance with §24-­‐37.5-­‐105(9), the State of Colorado Chief Technology Officer (CTO) adopts the following standard to guide the procurement and use of Mobile Devices for use in all applicable State of Colorado Applications. This Standard shall be titled “MobileDevices-­‐2012v1”.

metadata.attribution: State of Colorado, Chief Technology Officer

name: OIT Standards - Mobile Devices-2012v1
